about.contentParagraph0: I'm a frontend software developer with {{experience}} years of experience and starting a route in a backend development.
about.contentParagraph1: My professional goal is to create scalable, reliable and user-friendly software and applications.
about.contentParagraph2: I'm like a chameleon because I can adapt to constant changes, with a reduced learning curve, demonstrating leadership during the process.
about.contentParagraph3: I am passionate about technology and gadgets, I always try to have new knowledge of software development, new hardware and how to implement them in my daily job.
about.title: About me

netlogistik.description: Develop and implementing systems for supply chain, working with industry leaders as Honeywell, BlueYonder and Supplynet from NetLogistik.

zuma.description: Develop and testing COBOL programs for CitiBanamex clients system.
